title: Ticket #30: Add ability to get email notification on ticket creation
description:
It should be possible to get email when any new ticket is created, as an alternative to monitoring the timeline.

Seems this should be a User option, maybe a feature bitmask similar to the permissions mask is needed for this and the no-email portion of #28.
remarks:
2009-Feb-20 03:47:11 by tannenba:
Using gittrac's ticket change notification feature, I think we can easily have gittrac send email to whomever is assigned the ticket and cc the list of email addresses in the notify field.

Maybe something like this would work:

echo 'An update was made to your ticket #%n by user %u. \n\n Title: %t\n URL: http://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktview?tn=%n\n Created By: %w\n Assigned To: %a\n Current Status: %s\n\nLove, your friendly Condor Wiki service\n' | /bin/mail -s '[CondorWiki] %u updated ticket %n: %t' -c `echo '%c' | /usr/bin/tr -s ',[:blank:];' ','` %A

(all on one line)

The tr embedded in there is to convert spaces between addresses listed in ticket notify fields into commas.
